jardin-del-alma.title: Jardín Del Alma
jardin-del-alma.subtitle: Interactive Website for Event Hall
jardin-del-alma.description: Interactive and optimized page to display price catalog of rental packages for Jardín Del Alma event hall. Attractive visual experience and easy to use.
jardin-del-alma.longDescription: Jardín Del Alma is a web page developed during my professional stay 1 at UP Chiapas (March-July 2023). The project focuses on creating an interactive web experience that allows users to explore the various rental packages offered by the event hall in a visual and attractive way.
features: Promotion of packages with attractive UI/UX design
challenges: Creating an attractive visual experience to display packages
Optimizing image loading for better performance
Implementing intuitive and accessible navigation
Developing reusable components in React
solutions: Use of CSS Modules for modular and responsive styles
Implementation of lazy loading of images
Architecture of reusable React components
Design centered on user experience
Web performance optimization

pase-de-lista.title: Digital Attendance System
pase-de-lista.subtitle: Multi-platform Mobile App - UP Chiapas
pase-de-lista.description: Mobile multi-platform (iOS and Android) app developed in Flutter to digitize and modernize the attendance control process in educational institutions. Actively used by teachers at the University of Chiapas.
pase-de-lista.longDescription: I developed a multi-platform mobile app using Flutter to digitize and modernize the attendance control process in educational institutions. The app allows managing institutions, groups, students, and attendance passes with fluid animations, local synchronization, and PDF/CSV report generation. Deployment on App Store and Play Store.
features: Creation of groups by grade and section
Registration of students with name and enrollment
File sharing via WhatsApp, email, etc.
challenges: Designing a robust and scalable MVC architecture
Optimizing the user experience on mobile devices
Integrating fluid animations and smooth transitions
Ensuring multi-platform compatibility (iOS/Android)
solutions: Use of Flutter and Dart for multi-platform UI/UX
Local SQLite database for performance and offline
Typed services and models for business logic
Deployment on App Store and Play Store

light-center-ios.title: Light Center iOS
light-center-ios.subtitle: Deployment and Optimization - iOS Application
light-center-ios.description: Deployment and publication of the Light Center app on the App Store, managing the entire publication process for iOS developed with Flutter.
light-center-ios.longDescription: Project of deployment and optimization of the Light Center app for iOS (October-November 2023). I was responsible for coordinating the entire publication process on the App Store, from resource configuration to successful launch for spa and beauty centers users.
features: Coordination of the publication and deployment process for iOS
Optimization of resources and descriptions for the App Store
Extensive testing on real iOS devices and TestFlight
Management of metadata, keywords, and graphical material
Verification of compliance requirements and Apple privacy
Successful launch for spa and beauty center users
challenges: Complete resource configuration for the App Store
Preparation of the app for Apple review
Management of metadata and keywords for positioning
Compliance with Apple privacy and security policies
Optimization of performance for iOS devices
solutions: Use of App Store Connect for complete publication management
Implementation of TestFlight for extensive beta testing
Metadata configuration for better App Store positioning
Verification of compliance with Apple policies

prediction-software.title: Prediction Software
prediction-software.subtitle: Redesign & Modernization Front-end
prediction-software.description: Complete redesign and modernization of the Prediction Soft platform, focusing on user experience, responsive design, and modern Front-end architecture.
prediction-software.longDescription: Prediction Software is a completely redesigned platform to offer a modern, fluid, and attractive user experience. I led the complete redesign, implementing dynamic components in React.js, custom styles with CSS3 and Bootstrap, and integrating an intelligent ChatBot for customer support. The project was developed under Scrum methodology, with iterative deliveries and a mobile-first approach.
features: Responsive design optimized for all devices
challenges: Redesigning the Front-end architecture without affecting the current operation
Optimizing performance on mobile and desktop devices
Integrating an intelligent ChatBot without affecting the experience
Ensuring cross-browser compatibility
solutions: Use of React.js for dynamic components
Bootstrap and CSS3 for responsive design and animations
Integration of ChatBot with user-friendly interface
Iterative development with organized Scrum and sprints

coepes-chiapas.title: Coepes Chiapas
coepes-chiapas.subtitle: Web Platform for Educational Offers
coepes-chiapas.description: Centralized web platform that revolutionizes access to university information in Chiapas, connecting high school students with educational opportunities in an intuitive and efficient way.
coepes-chiapas.longDescription: I developed a comprehensive web platform for the consultation of university offers in Chiapas. The system allows intelligent searches, advanced filters, automatic PDF generation, and an optimized user experience for high school students. The portal centralizes information from multiple universities and facilitates comparison and download of academic plans.
features: Advanced search engine by career and university
Customized filters by location, cost, and modality
Responsive design for mobile and tablets
challenges: Centralizing updated regional educational information
Optimizing search and filtering experience
Generating personalized PDFs efficiently
Designing an intuitive interface for students
solutions: Implementation of a personalized search engine
Use of Tailwind CSS for responsive and modern design
Dynamic PDF generation with selected information
Clear and centered information architecture

dr-nabani.title: Dr. Nabani Mobile App
dr-nabani.subtitle: Comprehensive Esthetic Medicine Platform
dr-nabani.description: Multi-platform mobile app for Dr. Nabani Matus, with UI/UX design in Figma and development in Flutter/Dart. Comprehensive platform for consultation management, medical history, service catalog, payments, and medical chat.
dr-nabani.longDescription: I developed a multi-platform mobile app with Flutter/Dart for Dr. Nabani Matus, including pre-design in Figma for mobile, web, and tablet views with responsive focus. The app integrates digital medical orientation, appointment management, service catalog, medical chat, medical history, post-operative care, integrated payments, and personalized notifications. Clean Architecture, RESTful integration, and Material Design.
features: Digital medical orientation with interactive questionnaires
challenges: Designing a reliable and modern medical experience
Integrating secure payments and notifications
Optimizing medical history and appointment management
Developing a scalable and maintainable architecture
solutions: UI/UX design in Figma for all views
Use of Flutter and Material Design for responsive UI
Integration of Stripe and push notifications
Clean Architecture and state management

animenariolist.title: AnimeNarioList
animenariolist.subtitle: Your quick guide to the world of anime
animenariolist.description: Minimalist web app to search, organize, and export anime lists. Fluid interface, no ads, and export to Excel.
animenariolist.longDescription: AnimeNarioList was born from my obsession with anime and the need to keep everything organized as a good developer. It allows you to quickly search for animes, create personalized lists, and export them to Excel to share. The app is built with clean design principles, Atomic Design, and an emphasis on performance and maintainability. The code is modular, tested, and ready to scale with future features like favorites, tags, or integration with external APIs.
challenges: Applying Atomic Design for maximum maintainability
Optimizing search performance
Exporting data in a user-friendly way to Excel
Keeping the UI clean and responsive
solutions: Reusable and hierarchical components
TailwindCSS for fast and consistent styles
Customized Excel export logic
Continuous testing and refactoring
